narrative: Adjusted twine command to use repository alias and verbose flag, bumping version to 0.2.35 for clean TestPyPI publishing.
user_input:
twine upload --repository testpypi dist/* --verbose

that is the command to publish a test, make sure that your Makefile is adjusted accordingly.
Bump version to 0.2.35
scene: Before: uploads used explicit URL and version 0.2.27. After: Makefile calls twine with repository alias and verbose output, version now 0.2.35.
